extendedInfo.description: A handy new tool for making those trips out to the rain gauge a little easier. This tool allows you to enter your rain logging data into the online rainlog.org database directly and simply from your mobile Android device.To use this app, you must first register for rain logging on the Rainlog website.http://rainlog.org

reviews.title: Serious downer :o(
reviews.comment: I was so looking forward to being able to track my rainfall on my mobile and easily refer to history, then I saw that I had to live in Arizona - I dont even live in the US - major bummer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: U don\'t have to b in Arizona!
reviews.comment: I wish the graphics were better, but you can see all of your rainfall records online and on a Google Map. I\'m in South Florida. Problem with map on my smartphone: Can\'t read or click on rainfall amounts.
reviews.author: Mike Higgins

reviews.title: Great interface
reviews.comment: Use to reporting on the full site, this is so much better
reviews.author: Taye Mayo

reviews.title: Happy to see Arizona
reviews.comment: I\'ve reported my rain on the UA website for years. Full size website is do-able on Android,  but this interface is great. Thanks so much for making an app!
reviews.author: A Google User
